page.syntax: Text as C = GetToOffset as C()

argument.name: Text
argument.description: The buffer contents up to the current offset.

page.description: Return text up to current offset.
page.discussion: The <StringScanner>.GetToOffset() function returns the buffer contents up to the current offset.
page.example: dim scanner as P dim txt as C txt = <<%text% This is wonderful prose written by a technical writer of note. %text% ? txt = This is wonderful prose written by a technical writer of note. scanner = stringscanner.create(txt) scanner.scanover(8) ? scanner.gettooffset() = "This is "
